skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Add Alexa to your smart building to speed up your control experience and make your life more convenient. Simple and intuitive voice commands activate scenes and allow you to control individuals or groups of devices.

Start by asking your installer for assistance, who enables the Voice Control feature and renames the devices and scenes exposed to Alexa voice assistant using the dedicated Ilevia Manager configuration software.

The following is required to successfully set up the “Ilevia Smart Home” skill:
- An Ilevia X1 Server is installed in the system.
- The Ilevia X1 Server is fully configured and has been put into operation.
- On the Ilevia X1 Server, the "Voice Control" feature must be enabled.
- The Ilevia X1 server is connected to the internet.
- An Alexa device is available and has been set up.
- The following access data or passwords must be available:
- Amazon account (e-mail address + password)
- Access data from the Ilevia X1 Server (Voice Control ID, generated during the configuration)

To control your Smart Home with your Ilevia X1 Server say, for example:
- Alexa, turn on light
- Alexa, turn off light
- Alexa, set light to red
- Alexa, unlock door
- Alexa, lock the door
- Alexa, set the thermostat to 23
- Alexa, turn off the thermostat
- Alexa, open shutter
- Alexa, close shutter
- Alexa, run Goodnight
- Alexa, run Good morning
